Metoprolol is indicated for the treatment of angina pectoris in adults.

Metoprolol is not indicated for the treatment of postherpetic neuralgia.
Metoprolol is indicated for the treatment of atrial fibrillation in adults.

Metoprolol is indicated for the treatment of hypertensive emergencies in adults.

Metoprolol is indicated for the treatment of coronary artery disease in adults.
